mapper.insert: insert into LOAN_ORG_CATALOG (SERIALNO, ORGTYPE, ORGNAME, ORGCODE, STATUS, PEOPLEBANKONOFF, CREDITONOFF, PUTOUTONOFF, REPAYMENTONOFF, PUTOUTTIPSONOFF, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, REPAYMENTTIPSONOFF, FUNDCHECKDATE, FUNDCHECKDATATYPE, BILLINGCYCLE, BILLINGDATE, TEMPSAVEFLAG, CHANGEFLAG) values (#{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orgcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peoplebankonoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creditonoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{putoutonoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repaymentonoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{putouttipsonoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inputorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateorgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repaymenttipsonoff,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundcheckdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fundcheckdatatype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingcycle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{billingdate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tempsaveflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{changeflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select SERIALNO, ORGTYPE, ORGNAME, ORGCODE, STATUS, PEOPLEBANKONOFF, CREDITONOFF, PUTOUTONOFF, REPAYMENTONOFF, PUTOUTTIPSONOFF, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, REPAYMENTTIPSONOFF, FUNDCHECKDATE, FUNDCHECKDATATYPE, BILLINGCYCLE, BILLINGDATE, TEMPSAVEFLAG, CHANGEFLAG from LOAN_ORG_CATALOG where SERIALNO = #{serialno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SERIALNO, ORGTYPE, ORGNAME, ORGCODE, STATUS, PEOPLEBANKONOFF, CREDITONOFF, PUTOUTONOFF, REPAYMENTONOFF, PUTOUTTIPSONOFF, INPUTDATE, UPDATEUSERID, UPDATEDATE, INPUTUSERID, INPUTORGID, UPDATEORGID, REPAYMENTTIPSONOFF, FUNDCHECKDATE, FUNDCHECKDATATYPE, BILLINGCYCLE, BILLINGDATE, TEMPSAVEFLAG, CHANGEFLAG from LOAN_ORG_CATALOG
